ActorTalk: Gray Raven Commandant—hey, perfect timing. Take a seat.
This is a toy lie detector put together by an Engineering Force hobby group. It's actually pretty accurate.
For example, if I say...
Oh right, I gave those damn higher-ups a good scolding today.
Karenina?
What's that sound?
That means I'm telling the truth.
And... I haven't seen the Gray Raven Commandant today.
Was that the wrong sound?
(Sit down)
(Stay standing)
Backtrack Test
Yeah, just say anything.
Since you're already sitting, you're not allowed to leave! I'm not biting. Just say whatever comes to mind!
Heh, clever. They're planning to sell this later, and I just happen to need a guinea pig. You get what I mean.
Want me to just say something random?
But I refuse!
(Can't resist!)
What's wrong? Why are you not saying anything?
Can't think of anything to say right now.
Let's play a riddle game—guess who I'm thinking of.
Huh? Leaving already...? Ahem, I-I mean, go ahead and do what you need to do!
